text: Variance: Var(X) The Variance is; Var(X) = szp - pz To calculate the Variance: « square each value and multiply by its probability « sum them up and we get Ex2p « then subtract the square of the Expected Value p? Example continued: X 1 2 3 4 5 6 p 01 01 01 01 01 05 x2p 01 04 09 16 25 18 %D = 0.1+0.4+0.9+1.6+2.5+18 = 23.5 Var(X) = x%p - p2 = 23.5- 452 =3.25 The variance is 3.25
